1627637997_1B6JScbE4NxJHgSVTGGjeNhk157tp.body: Kali Linux is good for this. You don't have to install it, because there is a live version. In the system there are all the tools you need to crack the password and so on. There are numerous tutorials on the Internet on how to do this.
